Package org.simplity.kernel.comp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    component of this application engine.
    Loadable
    class that is designed to be loaded from an xml file using XMlUtils
    OnTheFlyManager<T extends Component>
    some components are organized into a collection that is saved in a file.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentManager<T extends Component>
    class that knows where resources persist and how to get a stream to read them We are still debating whether we are better-off writing individual classes rather than this parameterized utility class
    Entry
    simple map of a component name and the class it should map to.
    GroupManager<T extends Component>
    some components are organized into a collection that is saved in a file.
    ReferredComponent
    Simple data structure to represent a dependence between two components
    ValidationContext  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComponentType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MissingComponentError
    sub-class of ApplicationError.
